content.rendered:
Strategic Steps for the Quality Development:

  • Defining the role and tasks in the quality assurance system at different levels;
  • Changing the organizational structure during quality management, i.e. distributing responsibility and activities to relevant levels;
  • Establishing sustainable registration policies;
  • Redefining responsibilities for elected bodies;
  • Developing and perfecting an internal model of institutional evaluation;
